Application.Read.All.impact: Can read application configurations and secrets

Application.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can create, modify, and delete applications and their credentials

Directory.Read.All.impact: Can read all directory information including users, groups, and applications

Directory.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can read and write all directory information

User.Read.All.impact: Can read user profiles and organizational information

User.ReadWrite.All.description: Read and write all users' full profiles
User.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can read and write user profiles and manage user accounts

Group.Read.All.impact: Can read group information and memberships

Group.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage groups and group memberships

RoleManagement.Read.All.impact: Can read role assignments and role definitions

RoleManagement.ReadWrite.All.description: Read and write role management data
RoleManagement.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage role assignments and create custom roles

Policy.Read.All.impact: Can read conditional access and other policies

Policy.ReadWrite.All.description: Read and write your organization's policies
Policy.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage conditional access and security policies

AuditLog.Read.All.impact: Can read audit logs and sign-in reports

SecurityEvents.Read.All.impact: Can read security events and alerts

SecurityActions.Read.All.impact: Can read security actions and investigations

Mail.ReadWrite.description: Read and write access to user mail
Mail.ReadWrite.impact: Can read and send emails on behalf of user

Files.Read.All.description: Read all files that the user can access
Files.Read.All.impact: Can read all files across the organization

Files.ReadWrite.All.description: Have full access to all files user can access
Files.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can read, write, and delete files across the organization

User.Read.description: Sign in and read user profile
User.Read.impact: Can read basic user profile information

offline_access.description: Maintain access to data you have given it access to
offline_access.impact: Application can access data without user being present

Mail.Send.impact: Can send emails on behalf of the user

Calendars.ReadWrite.description: Have full access to user calendars
Calendars.ReadWrite.impact: Can read and modify user calendar events

Contacts.ReadWrite.description: Have full access to user contacts
Contacts.ReadWrite.impact: Can read and modify user contacts

DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite..description: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite..impact: Can manage device configurations and compliance policies

DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.description: Read and write Microsoft Intune managed devices
DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.impact: Can manage and control organizational devices

Sites.ReadWrite.All.description: Read and write items in all site collections
Sites.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can access and modify SharePoint content across the organization

Sites.FullControl.All.description: Have full control of all site collections
Sites.FullControl.All.impact: Complete administrative control over SharePoint sites

Reports.Read.All.impact: Can read organizational usage and activity reports

Domain.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage organizational domains and DNS settings

Organization.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can modify organizational settings and configurations

Agreement.ReadWrite.All.description: Read and write all terms of use agreements
Agreement.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage terms of use and consent agreements

IdentityProvider.ReadWrite.All.impact: Can manage external identity providers and federation settings

medium.description: Moderate impact, read access to sensitive data

high.description: High impact, write access to critical resources
